text: uthuru koriyawa wisin pasugiyada siya nawathama antharmahadwipika balastik misayilaya athhada balima pilibanda adahas dakwamin amerikanu thanapathiniya mese pawasa atha.
thobiyas mulu hithinma kamaththa prakasha karanawa.
namuth eeta wasara gananakata pasu mata mema thanuwatama ema yugayema nipayunu thawath sinhala giyak asannata labuni.
balanna deyak naththemaya..
sarath mama mata hithena hati eke dapa ekak meke liyana gane mata mathak wena pudgalayek innawa.
namudu aya ha age samiya athara ethek thibu honda hitha da tikin tika dedara yannata wiya.awasanaye aya ohugen wen wiya.
shri lankawa thula wagema lokaya thulath sancharaka kshethraya thula athi wi thibena aluthma ralla thamayi me kandawuru ha dhira kriya....
wichara oone na.
wahab wadaya ugra wunoth samanya muslim janathawa pawa sinhala demala jathikayange kopayata lakwewi.

thamange sith gath ayata napoliyan asimithawa aadaraya kala.ohu wisin aැyawa wiwaha karagena dina ෙdakakata pasuwa wadagath yudha meheyumakata napoliyanta ithaliya bala yanna siddhawuna , ohu ithaliye sita witin wita ayata aadara hasun yawuwa, dinak ayata ithaliya bala ena lesa napoliyan aaradhana kala, namuth aya ithaliya wetha eema prathikshepa kala, me gana sakahithapu napoliyan wahama pranshaya bala aawa.

kumbaal karmanthaya yanu merata ithihasaye mul yugaye sita pawatha ennak.matiyen nimawena bhanda pariharanaya sharira saukhyayata hithakara bawa norahasak.ewani rakagathayuthu karmanthayak ganwathurata hasuwimen winashawime puwathak mundalama - pulichchankulama pradeshayen warthawanawa.mundalama - pulichchankulama pradeshaye bahutharayakage pradhana jiwanopaya wanne kumbaul karmanthayayi.gammanaye pawul 30ka samajikayin 300k pamana mema karmanthaye srujuwama niyalenawa.mutti, athili, matikoppa, karamudi, guruleththu, kalagedi, hatti aadiya atharata wisithuru pochchi warga menma wiwidha aayiththamwalin opamattam kala mati pahan warga da mowunge dathin nimawena nishpadana atharata ayath.
anathuruwa he kolambaa supiri awan halak arambaiya.
lenagen his wuna kuduwata paminiye law bards jodu kihipayaki.
ko me marayiya ?
samanayayen kanthawak kamaganna mesayen nagita yana wita ho kama mesayata paminena wita pirimin thama asunen nagita ayata aachara dakwiya yuthuya.
kadet niladhari puhunu patamalawen pasuwa yudha hamuda kamando rejimenthuwata ekwimata swechchawen ma idiripath wunemi. 1993 warshaye di wiwaha wu athara, ma hata ek pirimi daruwaku siti.
jathiwadaya thama deshapalana wyaparaya wyaptha kirimata wishala lesa upayogi kara gaththe ya.
mewara ema dinaya paminena dinaya
eyage munupura thamayilu [kublayi khan ] chinaya mulumanin palanaya karanna patan gaththe .
honda honda kotu panili athine.
eeth mama waradiyi.
me awurudde nam yanna wenne nathiya.

ema dariyage niwasata athulu wi dariyage kate gam ga kolayak alawa pasuwa ema niwase wikiŒmata thibu pa‚ walalu hathak da aaharayata gena dariyath ragena niwasin baharata giya bawa rahas polisiya hamuwe prakasha kara thibe.
yapum krushikarmayen midi diyunu wanija krushikarmanthayak kara gowi janathawa nambaurukarawima da nawa sangramaye aramunaki.
mama eyage pawula ee kiyanne nanda ekka hamadema kala.
eya ithama sadharana kramaya yayi oba sithanawada?
dhawanaya kala nohaki ayurin wahanaya hani wi thibu heyin eya adagena yamata siduwa thibini.

mulu dawasa purama wikiye wadakarala loku dayakathwayak dena eka nam wikiye sanwardhanayata loku hayiyak habayi, ehema kala kiyala wikiyata sambandha jyeshta parishilakayan kiyana dewal ahanne nathiwa pora tok dena eka nam honda deyak neweyi.
mewa antharjathika kumanthrana.
kurukshethrayaka ranil, oba nohandanna!
oya kawuda kiyala danan nowa bola me katha karanne.

mahajanathawata kapawu mahajana niyojithayek hatiyata, ee mahajana sewaya wada karyakshamawa kirima sandaha mewani badu sahana laba dena athara ema badu sahanayata muwawi itha ihala gananakata wikuna mahabhandagarayata ya yuthu mudal thama sakkuwata dama ganna deshapaluwan wimata me wanawita shri lanka parlimenthuwe sama manthriwarayekma samath wi thibenawa.
athithaye wage jilmatwalin eeka wenas karanna baha.
indika lankawata giyapu welawe trayal ekakuth elawanna dila thiyenawalu.
polis komisama dakwa yanna hakiyi.
oba samata subha aluth awuruddak wewa!!
pandiyanta wishleshanaya, tharka baha.
ohu raja wu mul wasarema dakunu laka wadagath pawulaka thissa nam tharunayekuta, anawaki karuweku wisin ohu anagathaye lankawe raja wana bawa kiyayi.
kalamanakaruweku thakshanaye sidu wana me wenas kam pilibanda sanwediwa sitiya yuthu ya.
eda indan ada wenakan awurudu wisipahak thisse umbaa enakan man balan innawa kiyala umbaa thama dan'nadda ?

ethan patan pandara paha wanathuru ande sita wiwidha kalpanawan osse dawasa menehi kirimath nindath nonindath athara andatama wi sitima th, ohu dawase gewanu labana thrupthimath ma horawayi.
"onna ohe uuth kamathi eke ,igena gaththawe puthalayi amme ..."
mata honda saukhya sampanna lingika ha chiththawegiya jiwithayak awashyayi.
nathnam wadak naha.
meya mage nirmanayak nowana athara hudu winodaswadaya sandaha pala kirimak pamanaki.
amarathunga mahatha nano thathpara gana kiyana bawin ee prashnaya adala ya.
mewa sambandhayen aanduwa monawa katha kalath eewa prayogikawa kala nohakiya.
mokada apita labunu diyunuma dewal api pawichchi karala thiyenne waradi widiyata kiyala ithihasaya diha balapuwama therenawa.
thawath samaharu uthsaha karanne pragithge kara pitin thamange gaman yannatayi.
sthanaya : kolambaa galadhari hotalaya
ispirithalen pita wenda ee daruwata labune dawas wissakata withara passe.
ee hama ekekma me sakkiliyata honda wadi wachana.
me wanawita prakashitha mathiwarana prathipala walin 45%katath wada chanda laba gena wadima manthridhura sankhyawak dina gena aththeda ee pakshayayi.
umbaa eekita aththatama aadare kala nisa umbaata ehema hithuna eka sadharanayi!

peroksidesa, layisosayima, laktoferin wani prathijiwaka karaka kelawala nipadawe.

rasik mohomad riyas namaththa birathanya kridakayan dedena heroyin miladi ganima sandaha giya thrirodaye riyaduru wana athara heroyin laba ganima sandaha sana saha channa namaththa birathanya ragar kridakayan dedena sambandha kara di aththe thriroda riyaduru wisini.

wayambaa palatha kendra kara ganimin mewara pawathwena dayata kirula pradarshanayata rupiyal miliyana siyayak waya kara athi bawa widuli sandesha ha thorathuru thakshana amathi ranjith siyambaalapitiya mahatha prakasha kaleya.mewara pradarshanaya wenuwen kerena idikirim thawakalaka lesa nowa digukalina prayojana gatha haki wana paridi sidu karana lesa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha upades dun bawath ee anuwa me wana wita idikirim walin siyayata siyayak ma ema upades anuwa sidu karamin thibena bawath ee mahatha kiweya.mewara kuliyapitiya wishwawidyalaya, karmika widyalaya ha kuliyapitiya madhya maha widyalaya mulika kota gena warga adi ek laksha hatadahasaka bim pramanayak pura pradarshanaya pawathwena bawath mema aayathanawala siyalu idikirim digukalina prayojana gatha haki paridi idi kerena bawath ee mahatha pawasiya.me wana wita ema aayathanawala aaraksha ansha samajikayin siyalu aluth wadiya katayuthu sidu karana bawath godanagili idikirime aayathanaya, wayambaa idikirim departhamenthuwa, rajya injineru departhamenthuwa eewaye idikirim katayuthu sidu karana bawath siyambaalapitiya mahatha sandahan kaleya.labana wasare pebarawari masaya aarambha wana wita me siyalu idikirim katayuthu nima kara pradarshanayata sudanam wana bawath amathiwaraya wadi duratath prakasha kaleya..

me athara rajya aayathanayak wana shri lanka kaju sansthawa 2016 wasare rupiyak thunkoti dasa lakshayaka shuddha labhayak upayagena athi bawa wawili karmantha amathyanshaya parlimenthuwata idiripath kara nawathama karyasadhana warthawa sadahan karayi.
rajithata anuwa ja wi pe ha koti athara wenasak naha.
mahajana saukhya parikshakawaru ema pudgalayan nawathi sitina sthanawalata gos warin wara ohuge ho ayage saukhya thaththwaya wimasa balanawa.
aasaditha rudhiraya shariragatha wima ha aasaditha mawakata labena daruwa aasadanayata lakwima wayirasaya labiya haki anek aakarayanya.
pasu dina rathriye madakalapuwa sita paminena dumriyakata pahara dun athara dedeneku maranayata path wiya.
kalin gani amathaka karamu.

wathura wadipura athi awasthawala narambaimedi aarakshakari wiya yuthuya.
"daduwam paminawimata nohaki tharamata aparadha ha waradikirim melowa itha sulabha bawin waradkaruwata daduwam paminawimata wada nirdoshi pudgalayeku rakima itha wadagath we.

uuta 100% sadharana kenthiya thibbe ekata. ..
wigananayata mewa awashya wenne naha.
dena sapot ekak bokkenma denna oona kiyala wage amma thawath tikak thaththata lanwuna.
ee sinduwe ena mokak hari padayak, awasthawak, siddhiyak uda thiyena eka kathawakata sambandha karanna puluwan nam maru.
oya ali panaha oththe gananwalin gas oththe sankhyawaka loweth bandinna ba kiyala mama siya denek ekka withara tharaka karala athi..
ee praweshaya sandaha lakunu itha wadiyen ma awashya patamalawaka ya.
wisheshayenma, komiyunistwarun sandaha ohu mema wagakimwala usas mattamak niyama kaleya.
dan kale athula ransirilalge aprabhansawalata wadiye tayi mama karapu dosthara honda hitha, soro, galiwar wagema hungak sambhawya ingrisi chithrapati thamath aasawen balanne anna eeka nisa thama :)
samanyyen udenma thiyena kochchiyaka naggama gahakola, aladola, wathu, nagara madden hithala hulagath ekka mage nawathumen bahiddi ata wenawa.

balaye pawathina oonama aanduwakata ewani udghoshana sandaha sanwedi wimata ha eewata yahapath prathichara dakwimatath hakiyawa thibiya yuthuya.

ath deka parissan koragena agrimek ekata kola dena eka tikak parawesamata koranna oona wadak..podda gassunoth athath ekka thama goyan mitiya athulata andila yanne ehema giyoth ithin athe ganna deyak naha..ata thalila nawathinne...ithin kohoma hari ape jumata ge gawama attattar kihipayakma thibuna hinda apata wada ikmanata attattar elona eka allaganna puluwan una...
dan aayema iskole yanna ba mis, api gedara yannam mehema kiyala mun tika niladhari mandalayata net bolayakma bassala bag wala dan aapu amathara adumak dan ape un ekka park gihin..

ehi handinwima pamanak, chayarupayata nagagaththa.

me nisa mama wahama wanathawilluwa pradeshiya sabhawe lekam warayawa danuwath kala min pasu mema sthanaye diya namata paminena kisiwakutath gini awilimata ida nodenna ee wagema ragena ena polithin siyalla damanna bagayak haduna dennath danwuwa .eyata amatharawa paminena sama wahanayakinma rupiyal 500 ka mudalak radawa gena rugena yana siyalu apadrawya aapasu rugena with bhara dimen pasuwa radawum mudala laba dimatath yojanawak kala ee nisa idiriyedi kalaoya winasha kirima nawathi yayi disthrik lekam waraya pawasiya.
ema ratawal muhuna di sitina aarthika pasubama hamuwe apage bhanda sandaha pawathina apanayana illuma aduwimada apage apanayana aadayam wardhanaya kara ganimedi apa muhunadi sitina gataluwaki.
me aarya sinhalayin men ma indu aarya janakotasda mahakala saha mahakali wandanawe yedenne ebawini.
eheth obala basa yodana hati gana mata wiwechanayak naha.
mita pera da ohu athin liyawunu boho pothapatha sammanadiyata menma pataka wicharaka kathabahata lakwannata hethu wuye me apurwa gunayaya.

yahapalana rajaya balayata path wimath samagama dina 100 wadapiliwela yatathe amathya champika ranawaka mathithuma muthurajawela thel gabada sankiranaye dharithawaya ton 60000 sita 90000 dakwa wadikarana ladi.eya ehi rakiyawe niyuthu siyalu sewakayin danna karunak we.esema ee siyalla sidukaranu labuwe wideshayakin kisindu mudalak laba nogena ape ratema sewaka mahathun yoda ganimini.ee sandaha muthurajawela gabada sankiranaye sewaka mahathun…
komishan sabha sandaha samajikayan path kirima sidu wanu aththe wyawasthadayaka mandalaya haraha wana athara mema kriyawaliya thula prajathanthrawadaya shakthimath kerenu atha.
me lokantharika niraya pawa ekama eka awasthawaka pamanak aalokawath wenawa.

walimada dimuthugama pradeshaye wiharasthanayakata rogi daruwakuta shanthi karmayak sidukara ganimata giya kanthawak wiharasthanaye himinamakage rupiyal 5500k pamana watina jangama durakathanayak soragena athayi polisiya kiyayi.sakakara kanthawa samanga soragath jangama durakathanaya athadanguwata gath bawa da walimada polisiya pawasiya.kuda daruwa samanga wiharasthanayata shanthi karmayak kara ganimata giya me kanthawa bimata jalaya illa athi athara, himinama jalaya gena eemata giya athare jangama durakathanaya soragena athi bawada polisiya sandahan kale ya.walimada sappukade, walimadagama pradeshaye padinchi 32 hawiridi sakakara kanthawa walimada adhikaranayata idiripath kirimata niyamithaya..
